title.rendered: USD Balances Live on Bitcoin.com for U.S. Users

content.rendered: Powered by MoonPay, USD Balances on Bitcoin.com Bring Instant, Zero-Fee Crypto Trading to U.S. Users. 13th February 2025 – United States-based users of the Bitcoin.com Wallet app can now fund their account with a USD balance, making it faster, easier, and cheaper than ever to trade between Bitcoin/crypto and fiat currencies like the United States […]
